column5: Hello,Has anyone been to Lac Charlotte from Air Tamarac?I have a trip in mid August. Any info helps greatly!Thanks!

I have a friend on it right now ,he will get back to me once he gets home. Charlotte produces some very nice fish ,being its mostly catch and release, you can eat all you want while there, cabin is only two yrs old,built for 4,Roads into Clova were not bad this yr. Good Luck

My friend LT from Pa. just got back from a 5 day trip to Charlotte, Water temp 65, 100+ walleyes a day,His sons were there for the first time. That sets the bar pretty high for other trips. Lt said it was his best trip yet.Air Tamarac's Camps on all three Lakes are producing very well, the bite will be on well into august. Temps still remain below normal, not looking like its going to warm up, Makes for some early fall fishing. My group is 47 weeks out from returning to Lac Hebert June 21 2015 Good luck up there
